import { useEffect, useState, useContext } from 'react'; import { MDBCard, MDBCardImage, MDBCardBody, MDBCardTitle, MDBCardText, MDBRow, MDBIcon, MDBCol } from 'mdb-react-ui-kit'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Styles from '../components/Product.module.css' export default function Product({products}) { //destructure product const {id, image, category, title, price } = product; return (


{title}
 {category} R${price} 5x de R${price} {/*comprar*/} {/*ver produto*/}
); }
